testcase.name: test_admin_login_portal_scope

error.message:
failed on setup with "AssertionError: Admin login failed: The preview environment is not responding. It may be starting up.
assert 502 == 200 + where 502 = <Response [502]>.status_code"

testcase.error: backend/tests/test_p58_dealer_draft_bulk_async.py:41: in admin_token assert res.status_code == 200, f"Admin login failed: {res.text}" E AssertionError: Admin login failed: The preview environment is not responding.
